trans-unit.source: Defines the routing behavior, which is used to configure the destination endpoints, filters and filtering options to be used during routing.
trans-unit.target: Define o comportamento de encaminhamento, que é utilizado para configurar os pontos finais de destino, filtros e opções de filtragem para ser utilizado durante o encaminhamento.

trans-unit.source: The RoutingBehavior registers all of the run-time components used by the routing service, including the channel initializer, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension>.
trans-unit.target: O RoutingBehavior regista todos os componentes de tempo de execução utilizados pelo serviço de encaminhamento, incluindo o inicializador de canal, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior"></xref> class with the specified routing configuration.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior"> </xref> classe com a configuração de encaminhamento especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior> registers all of the run-time components used by the routing service, including the channel initializer, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension>, which uses the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>regista todos os componentes de tempo de execução utilizados pelo serviço de encaminhamento, incluindo o inicializador de canal, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior>e a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension>que utiliza o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> especificado</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.SoapProcessingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract type for the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de contrato de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> especificado

trans-unit.source: The contract description to get the type of.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato ao obter o tipo de.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters*> method to support the behavior.
The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.
trans-unit.target: Objetos personalizados para o enlace de elementos tem acesso.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior*> method to support the behavior.
The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate*> method to support the behavior.
The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço do serviço.
